p: Beans incubated with A. obtectus, which were previously treated with different doses of O. basilicum, showed weight losses ranging between 0.81 ± 0.21% (120 μL dose) and 2.29 ± 0.31% (6 μL dose), while beans under a control treatment (2.44 ± 0.64%) had a weight loss significantly higher (F = 2.99; df = 5.18; p = 0.039) than the rest of the doses evaluated ( Figure 4).
